member.name: T:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization
member.summary:
Represents a Trakt authorization response, which contains information, such as access token and refresh token.
See also , , , , , , , , , , , , and .
See "Trakt API Doc - OAuth: Get Token" and "Trakt API Doc - Device: Get Token" for more information.

member.name: M:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Sets to the DateTime, when it is initialized. The instantiated authorization instance is invalid.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.AccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.RefreshToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the refresh token. Use this to exchange it for a new access token.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.AccessScope
member.summary: Gets or sets the token scope. See also .

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.ExpiresInSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the seconds, after which this authorization will expire.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.TokenType
member.summary: Gets or sets the token type. See also .

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.IsExpired
member.summary:
Returns, whether this authorization information is expired.
Returns false, if returns false, or, if the authorization information is expired.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.IsValid
member.summary:
Returns, whether this authorization information is valid.
Returns false, if is null, empty or contains spaces.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.IsRefreshPossible
member.summary:
Returns, whether this authorization information can be refreshed with a refresh token.
Returns false, if is null, empty or contains spaces.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.Created
member.summary: Returns the UTC DateTime, when this authorization information was created.

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the given values.
member.param: The access token for the new instance.
The optional refresh token for the new instance.
member.returns: A new instance with the given values.

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the given values.

The access token for the new instance.
The optional refresh token for the new instance.
member.returns: A new instance with the given values.

member.name: M:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthorization.CreateWith(System.DateTime,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance with the given values. of the created instance will have the default value of 3600 * 24 * 90 seconds, equal to 90 days.
member.param: The datetime, when the given access token was created. Will be converted to UTC datetime.
The access token for the new instance.
The optional refresh token for the new instance.
member.returns: A new instance with the given values.

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the given values.

The seconds, after which the given access token will expire.

member.returns: A new instance with the given values.

member.name: T:TraktApiSharp.Authentication.TraktAuthentication
member.summary:
Provides access to authentication methods common to both OAuth and Device authentication, such as refreshing and revoking the current access token.
Besides, contains current authorization state information.

member.summary: Calls to check, whether the current is not expired yet and was not revoked by the user.
member.param:
Indicates, whether the current should be refreshed, if it was revoked. If this is set to true, will be called.

Provides access to data retrieving methods specific to calendars.
This module contains all methods of the "Trakt API Doc - Calendars" section.

member.name: M:TraktApiSharp.Modules.TraktCalendarModule.GetUserShowsAsync(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32},TraktApiSharp.Requests.Params.TraktExtendedInfo,TraktApiSharp.Requests.Params.TraktCalendarFilter)
member.summary:
Gets all users s airing during the given time period.
OAuth authorization required.
See "Trakt API Doc - Calendars: My Shows" for more information.
member.param: The date, on which the time period should start. Defaults to today. Will be converted to the Trakt date-format.
1 - 31 days, specifying the length of the time period. Defaults to 7 days.
The extended info, which determines how much data about the shows should be queried. See also .
Optional filters for genres, languages, year, runtimes, ratings, etc. See also .
member.exception: Thrown, if the request fails.
Thrown, if the given days value is not between 1 and 31.

The extended info, which determines how much data about the shows should be queried. See also .
Optional filters for genres, languages, year, runtimes, ratings, etc. See also .
member.exception: Thrown, if the request fails.

Pauses watching a in a media center. Use this method, if the given episode has no valid ids.
OAuth authorization required.
See "Trakt API Doc - Scrobble: Start" for more information.
member.param: The , which will be scrobbled.
The , which will be used to scrobble the given episode.
The watching progress. Should be a value between 0 and 100.
Optional application version for the scrobble.
Optional application build date for the scrobble. Will be converted to the Trakt date-format.
member.returns: An instance, containing the successfully scrobbled episode's data.
member.exception: Thrown, if the request fails.
Thrown, if the given episode is null or if the given episode's ids are null and the given show is null.
Thrown, if given show's title is null or empty.
Thrown, if the given episode's season number is below zero or the given episode's number is below one. Thrown, if the given progress value is not between 0 and 100.

member.name: T:TraktApiSharp.Modules.TraktSearchModule
member.summary:
Provides access to data retrieving methods specific to search.
This module contains all methods of the "Trakt API Doc - Search" section.

Searches for movies, shows, episodes, people and / or lists with the given search query.
OAuth authorization not required.
See "Trakt API Doc - Search: Text Query" for more information.
member.param: The object type(s), for which will be searched. See also . Multiple values can be combined with a binary operator, like this: TraktSearchResultType.Movie | TraktSearchResultType.Show.
The query, for which will be searched.
Determines the text fields, which will be searched. See also .
Optional filter for genres, year, runtimes, ratings, etc. See also .
The extended info, which determines how much data about the movies, shows, episodes, people and / or lists should be queried. See also .
The page of the search results list, that should be queried. Defaults to the first page.
The maximum count of results for each page, that should be queried.
member.returns:
An instance containing the found movies, shows, episodes, people and / or lists and which also contains the queried page number, the page's item count, maximum page count and maximum item count.
See also and .
member.exception: Thrown, if the request fails.
Thrown, if the given searchQuery is null, empty or contains spaces. Thrown, if the given searchResultType is unspecified.
Thrown, if the given searchResultType is null

member.name: T:TraktApiSharp.Requests.Params.TraktShowFilter
member.summary:
Provides additional filter parameters for some methods.
Supported by , , , , , and .
This class has an fluent interface.
See "Trakt API Doc - Filters" for more information.
Initializes an instance with the given values.
member.param: An optional query string for titles and descriptions.
An optional four digit start year for the years parameter.
An optional four digit end year for the years parameter.
An optional array of Trakt genre slugs.
An optional array of two letter language codes.
An optional array of two letter country codes.
An optional instance for minutes.
An optional instance for ratings.
An optional array of content certificiations.
An optional aarray of network names.
An optional aarray of show states. See also .
member.exception: Thrown, if the given query string is null or empty. Thrown, if one of the given states is unspecified.

Thrown, if the given value does not have four digits. Thrown, if the given value does not have four digits. Thrown, if the begin value of the given runtimes range is below zero or if its end value is below zero or if its end value is below its begin value. Thrown, if the begin value of the given ratings range is below zero or if its end value is below zero or if its end value is below its begin value or if its end value is above 100. Thrown, if the given language codes array contains a language code, which has more or less than two letters. Thrown, if the given country codes array contains a country code, which has more or less than two letters.

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.TraktClient.IsValidForUseWithoutAuthorization
member.summary:
Returns, whether the client is valid to use for API requests, that do not require OAuth authorization.
To enable this behavior, you must set a valid Trakt Client Id. See .

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.TraktClient.IsValidForUseWithAuthorization
member.summary:
Returns, whether the client is valid to use for API requests, that require OAuth authorization.
To enable this behavior, you must set a valid Trakt Client Id and a valid Trakt Access Token. See . See .

member.name: P:TraktApiSharp.TraktClient.IsValidForAuthenticationProcess
member.summary:
Returns, whether the client is valid to use for OAuth authentication.
To enable this behavior, you must set a valid Trakt Client Id and a valid Trakt Client Secret. See . See .
